Name: VMDiskSecurityProfile
SummaryComment: Specifies the security profile settings for the managed disk. **Note**: It can only be set for Confidential VMs and required when using Confidential VMs.

Key.Name: SecurityEncryptionType
Key.SummaryComment: Gets or sets specifies the EncryptionType of the managed disk. It is set to VMGuestStateOnly for encryption of just the VMGuestState blob, and NonPersistedTPM for not persisting firmware state in the VMGuestState blob. **Note**: It can be set for only Confidential VMs and is required when using Confidential VMs.
